text:
<@U5SGFUU80> Love the feature!

Have some additional feedback as it relates to sandbox sites.
the URL for registration approval goes to the "first added url" from what we can see.
Being able to set the "registration domain in the settings would be incredibly useful"
Question for you on that, <@U25C65C3S> do you think it would live in settings or do you think it would live in domains as a setting?
And because PM... Why do you think one way or the other? :smile:
